description: An endogenous lipid mediator involved in various physiological processes, including inflammation.
A receptor implicated in inflammatory bowel disease and intestinal immune homeostasis.
A pro-inflammatory cytokine involved in systemic inflammation and immune responses.
A gene encoding an enzyme involved in corticosterone synthesis.
A group of inflammatory conditions of the colon and small intestine, including Crohn's disease and ulcerative colitis.
Inflammation of the colon, often presenting with abdominal pain and diarrhea.
